_header: O spousess most dear most bright most clear
Subjects: carols, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, carols to
_description: James Ryman, an orison to the Virgin Mary — three quatrains (aabb) with refrain, ‘Ora pro nobis’ and burden (b): ‘Sancta maria ora pro nobis’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O spowsesse most dere most bryȝt most clereIn heuen quere
                    hauyng no pere…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Vita et spes nostra cum sisEt ora pro
                    nobis
